column1: Health Economics & Health Policy MSc online
column5: About the programmeHealth Economics and Health Policy MSc is a fully online postgraduate programme for todayâ€™s aspiring Health Economics professionals. This programme has an active learning and research-led approach and allows you to study with Brunel from anywhere in the world.Graduates of this programme develop the skills and knowledge required to pursue an impactful career in global health economics and health policy. The course is particularly beneficial to professionals who are currently working in health and social care, local government, education, and the voluntary sector.
